docs.title: The Python Tutorial
docs.description: The official Python tutorial, covering the basics and more advanced features of the language.

docs.title: Python Standard Library
docs.description: Comprehensive documentation for Python's extensive standard library.

docs.title: PEP Index
docs.description: Python Enhancement Proposals, offering insights into the design and evolution of Python.

blogs.title: Real Python
blogs.description: A vast collection of high-quality Python tutorials, articles, and guides for all skill levels.

blogs.title: Python Insider
blogs.description: Official blog from the Python Software Foundation, covering news, releases, and community updates.

blogs.title: Towards Data Science (Python Tag)
blogs.description: A popular Medium publication with many articles on Python for data science, machine learning, and more.

youtube.title: Corey Schafer
youtube.description: Excellent Python tutorials covering a wide range of topics, from beginner to advanced.

youtube.title: freeCodeCamp.org
youtube.description: Offers comprehensive Python courses, including full-length beginner to advanced tutorials.

youtube.title: Sentdex
youtube.description: Focuses on Python for finance, AI, machine learning, and robotics, with practical examples.

youtube.title: Tech With Tim
youtube.description: Provides clear and concise Python tutorials, often project-based, suitable for beginners.

free_courses.title: Python for Everybody
free_courses.description: A popular free course by Dr. Charles Severance, focusing on Python for data analysis.

free_courses.title: Google's Python Class
free_courses.description: A free class for people with a little bit of programming experience, covering Python basics.

free_courses.title: Learn Python - Full Course for Beginners
free_courses.description: A comprehensive 4-hour beginner course available on YouTube.

free_courses.title: Introduction to Python Programming
free_courses.description: An introductory course from the University of Michigan on edX, often available for free audit.
